episodes.title: Yeniden
episodes.plot: Iskender takes Mecnun who has been unconscious for 8 years to the hospital. Just before the diagnosis, White Bearded Grandpa shows up to aid Mecnun.

episodes.title: Unutulan Bir Daha Hatirlanmaz
episodes.plot: After Leyla and Mecnun meet, Mecnun opens his eyes in a new desert; The White Room. Now he has one target ahead. He is going to stop Berk from marrying his fiance Leyla and keep their (Mecnun and Iskender's) house for themselves.

episodes.title: Tarihin Arka Kapisi
episodes.plot: Breaking the unique Chinese vase, which has only 17 more of them, Mecnun now will go to China in 16th century to find and bring one.

episodes.title: Gonul Isleri
episodes.plot: Leyla got the house from Mecnun and now Mecnun, Iskender and White Beard Grandpa start living in a tent. Mecnun goes through a dilemma and something unexpected happens.

episodes.title: Kotuluk Yolu
episodes.plot: Leyla in the White Room is kidnapped by Incubus. Leyla on Earth gets Mecnun's tent demolished. Mecnun, accompanied by a big gang, heads for the source of the evil.

episodes.title: Deliler
episodes.plot: Mecnun helps Leyla organize an exhibition at the mental hospital. Iskender, Erdal and Yavuz also fell into a mental hospital for various reasons; the team gathers in the mental hospital.

episodes.title: Yalan Dolan
episodes.plot: While trying to learn about Leyla past, Mecnun is trapped by Leyla and finds himself in a situation he does not want.

episodes.title: Her Insan Bir Alemdir
episodes.plot: The team embarks on an adventure together to bring out the good in Leyla. Thanks to Kaan, Erdal gets success and money, but this time Iskender steps in.

episodes.title: Enerji
episodes.plot: After Leyla was rescued, her good and bad sides were separated. With this encounter, Maraz is born and disrupts the order of the world. While Mecnun is in love with Good Leyla, Bad Leyla makes everyone's life miserable.

episodes.title: Yeni Baslangiclar?
episodes.plot: Just as Mecnun was hopeful that he would have a future with Leyla but he learned that he had decided to marry Berk. He tries to prevent this marriage.
